option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="1100" height="780" viewBox="0 0 1100 780"> <style> .cls { font: 14px sans-serif; } .title { font: bold 16px sans-serif; } .box { fill:#fff; stroke:#2d3748; stroke-width:1.2; } .header { fill:#e5e7eb; } .rel { stroke:#374151; stroke-width:1.2; marker-end:url(#arrow); } .note { fill:#f9fafb; stroke:#e5e7eb; } </style> <defs> <marker id="arrow" viewBox="0 0 10 10" refX="10" refY="5" markerWidth="8" markerHeight="8" orient="auto-start-reverse"> <path d="M 0 0 L 10 5 L 0 10 z" fill="#374151" /> </marker> </defs>
<!-- Internaute --> <g transform="translate(40,40)"> <rect class="box" width="260" height="190" rx="6"/> <rect class="header" width="260" height="34" rx="6"/> <text class="title" x="10" y="22">Internaute</text> <g class="cls" transform="translate(10,50)"> <text y="0">id: Long</text> <text y="22">email: String</text> <text y="44">motDePasse: String</text> <text y="66">nom, prenom</text> <text y="88">adresse, ville, codePostal</text> <text y="110">telephone</text> </g> </g>
<!-- Panier --> <g transform="translate(380,40)"> <rect class="box" width="220" height="120" rx="6"/> <rect class="header" width="220" height="34" rx="6"/> <text class="title" x="10" y="22">Panier</text> <g class="cls" transform="translate(10,50)"> <text y="0">id: Long</text> <text y="22">internaute: Internaute (1:1)</text> </g> </g>
<!-- LignePanier --> <g transform="translate(680,40)"> <rect class="box" width="260" height="160" rx="6"/> <rect class="header" width="260" height="34" rx="6"/> <text class="title" x="10" y="22">LignePanier</text> <g class="cls" transform="translate(10,50)"> <text y="0">id: Long</text> <text y="22">produit: Produit (n:1)</text> <text y="44">panier: Panier (n:1)</text> <text y="66">quantite: Integer</text> <text y="88">sousTotal(): BigDecimal</text> </g> </g>
<!-- Produit --> <g transform="translate(40,280)"> <rect class="box" width="260" height="170" rx="6"/> <rect class="header" width="260" height="34" rx="6"/> <text class="title" x="10" y="22">Produit</text> <g class="cls" transform="translate(10,50)"> <text y="0">id: Long</text> <text y="22">nom: String</text> <text y="44">prix: BigDecimal</text> <text y="66">description: String</text> <text y="88">stock: Integer</text> </g> </g>
<!-- Commande --> <g transform="translate(380,250)"> <rect class="box" width="240" height="180" rx="6"/> <rect class="header" width="240" height="34" rx="6"/> <text class="title" x="10" y="22">Commande</text> <g class="cls" transform="translate(10,50)"> <text y="0">id: Long</text> <text y="22">dateCommande: LocalDateTime</text> <text y="44">statut: String</text> <text y="66">adresseLivraison: String</text> <text y="88">internaute: Internaute (n:1)</text> </g> </g>
<!-- LigneCommande --> <g transform="translate(680,250)"> <rect class="box" width="320" height="210" rx="6"/> <rect class="header" width="320" height="34" rx="6"/> <text class="title" x="10" y="22">LigneCommande</text> <g class="cls" transform="translate(10,50)"> <text y="0">id: Long</text> <text y="22">commande: Commande (n:1)</text> <text y="44">produitId: Long (snapshot)</text> <text y="66">produitNom: String (snapshot)</text> <text y="88">prixUnitaire: BigDecimal</text> <text y="110">quantite: Integer</text> <text y="132">sousTotal(): BigDecimal</text> </g> </g>
<!-- Relations --> <!-- Internaute 1--1 Panier --> <line class="rel" x1="300" y1="100" x2="380" y2="100"/> <text class="cls" x="315" y="90">1 — 1</text>
<!-- Panier 1--* LignePanier --> <line class="rel" x1="600" y1="120" x2="680" y2="120"/> <text class="cls" x="610" y="110">1 — *</text>
<!-- Produit 1--* LignePanier --> <line class="rel" x1="300" y1="340" x2="680" y2="160"/> <text class="cls" x="470" y="250">1 — *</text>
<!-- Internaute 1--* Commande --> <line class="rel" x1="300" y1="180" x2="380" y2="280"/> <text class="cls" x="320" y="230">1 — *</text>
<!-- Commande 1--* LigneCommande --> <line class="rel" x1="620" y1="320" x2="680" y2="320"/> <text class="cls" x="630" y="310">1 — *</text>
<!-- Note --> <g transform="translate(40,520)"> <rect class="note" width="1000" height="90" rx="6"/> <text class="cls" x="10" y="24">Remarques:</text> <text class="cls" x="20" y="48">• LigneCommande fige le produit (id/nom/prix) au moment de l’achat pour conserver l’historique.</text> <text class="cls" x="20" y="70">• Le total Panier/Commande est obtenu par la somme des sous‑totaux des lignes.</text> </g> </svg>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="1000" height="580" viewBox="0 0 1000 580"> <style> .bg{fill:#f3f4f6;} .hdr{fill:#111827;} .txt{font:14px sans-serif; fill:#374151;} .card{fill:#ffffff; stroke:#e5e7eb;} .btn{fill:#4f46e5;} </style> <rect class="bg" width="1000" height="580"/> <rect class="hdr" x="0" y="0" width="1000" height="56"/> <text class="txt" x="20" y="35" fill="#fff">e‑Commerce — Caisse</text>
<g transform="translate(40,90)"> <g> <rect class="card" width="450" height="300" rx="8"/> <text class="txt" x="16" y="32">Résumé du panier</text> <text class="txt" x="16" y="60">Laptop Pro 14 — x1 — 10,999.00 DH</text> <text class="txt" x="16" y="88">Souris Ergonomique — x2 — 498.00 DH</text> <text class="txt" x="16" y="130">Total: 11,497.00 DH</text> </g> <g transform="translate(480,0)"> <rect class="card" width="450" height="300" rx="8"/> <text class="txt" x="16" y="32">Adresse de livraison</text> <rect x="16" y="50" width="418" height="160" fill="#f9fafb" stroke="#e5e7eb" rx="6"/> <rect class="btn" x="16" y="222" width="200" height="32" rx="6"/> <text class="txt" x="24" y="243" fill="#fff">Valider la commande</text> </g> </g> </svg>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="1000" height="650" viewBox="0 0 1000 650"> <style> .bg{fill:#f3f4f6;} .hdr{fill:#111827;} .txt{font:14px sans-serif; fill:#374151;} .card{fill:#ffffff; stroke:#e5e7eb;} .row{fill:#f9fafb;} </style> <rect class="bg" width="1000" height="650"/> <rect class="hdr" x="0" y="0" width="1000" height="56"/> <g transform="translate(40,90)"> <rect class="card" width="920" height="160" rx="8"/> <text class="txt" x="16" y="32">Informations utilisateur</text> <text class="txt" x="16" y="60">Email: client@example.com</text> <text class="txt" x="16" y="84">Nom: Doe — Prénom: John</text> <text class="txt" x="16" y="108">Adresse: 123 Rue Atlas, Agadir 80000</text> </g> <g transform="translate(40,270)"> <rect class="card" width="920" height="300" rx="8"/> <text class="txt" x="16" y="32">Historique de commandes</text> <rect class="row" x="16" y="50" width="888" height="48" rx="6"/> <text class="txt" x="26" y="80">Commande du 2025-10-22 • En cours • Total 11497.00 DH</text> <rect class="row" x="16" y="110" width="888" height="48" rx="6"/> <text class="txt" x="26" y="140">Commande du 2025-10-20 • En cours • Total 1048.00 DH</text> </g> </svg>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="1000" height="580" viewBox="0 0 1000 580"> <style>.bg{fill:#f3f4f6;} .hdr{fill:#111827;} .txt{font:16px sans-serif; fill:#374151;} .card{fill:#ffffff; stroke:#e5e7eb;}</style> <rect class="bg" width="1000" height="580"/> <rect class="hdr" x="0" y="0" width="1000" height="56"/> <g transform="translate(200,130)"> <rect class="card" width="600" height="280" rx="10"/> <text class="txt" x="40" y="70">✅ Merci, votre commande a été validée</text> <text class="txt" x="40" y="110" fill="#6b7280">Un récapitulatif vous a été envoyé par e‑mail.</text> </g> </svg>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="1000" height="580" viewBox="0 0 1000 580"> <style> .bg{fill:#f3f4f6;} .hdr{fill:#111827;} .txt{font:14px sans-serif; fill:#374151;} .tbl{fill:#ffffff; stroke:#e5e7eb;} .btn{fill:#4f46e5;} .btn2{fill:#ef4444;} </style> <rect class="bg" width="1000" height="580"/> <rect class="hdr" x="0" y="0" width="1000" height="56"/> <text class="txt" x="20" y="35" fill="#fff">e‑Commerce — Panier</text>
<g transform="translate(40,90)"> <rect class="tbl" width="920" height="300" rx="8"/> <text class="txt" x="20" y="30">Produit</text> <text class="txt" x="520" y="30">Prix</text> <text class="txt" x="650" y="30">Qté</text> <text class="txt" x="750" y="30">Sous‑total</text>
<text class="txt" x="20" y="80">Souris Ergonomique</text> <text class="txt" x="520" y="80">249.00 DH</text> <text class="txt" x="650" y="80">3</text> <text class="txt" x="750" y="80">747.00 DH</text> <rect class="btn2" x="840" y="64" width="80" height="26" rx="6"/> <text class="txt" x="848" y="82" fill="#fff">Supprimer</text> </g>
<text class="txt" x="760" y="420">Total:</text> <text class="txt" x="810" y="420" fill="#4338ca">1,546.00 DH</text> <rect class="btn" x="820" y="450" width="140" height="32" rx="6"/> <text class="txt" x="836" y="471" fill="#fff">Passer à la caisse</text> </svg>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="1000" height="580" viewBox="0 0 1000 580"> <style> .bg { fill:#f3f4f6; } .card { fill:#ffffff; stroke:#e5e7eb; } .hdr { fill:#111827; } .txt { font:14px sans-serif; fill:#374151; } .ttl { font:bold 18px sans-serif; fill:#111827; } .btn { fill:#4f46e5; } .btn2{ fill:#e5e7eb; } </style> <rect class="bg" x="0" y="0" width="1000" height="580"/> <rect class="hdr" x="0" y="0" width="1000" height="56"/> <text class="txt" x="20" y="35" fill="#fff">e‑Commerce — Vitrine</text>
<!-- grid 3 cards --> <g transform="translate(40,90)"> <g> <rect class="card" width="280" height="180" rx="8"/> <text class="ttl" x="16" y="32">Produit A</text> <text class="txt" x="16" y="60">Description courte…</text> <text class="txt" x="16" y="150" fill="#4338ca">999.00 DH</text> <rect class="btn2" x="170" y="132" width="60" height="28" rx="6"/> <text class="txt" x="178" y="151">Détail</text> <rect class="btn" x="236" y="132" width="60" height="28" rx="6"/> <text class="txt" x="242" y="151" fill="#fff">Ajouter</text> </g> <g transform="translate(320,0)"> <rect class="card" width="280" height="180" rx="8"/> <text class="ttl" x="16" y="32">Produit B</text> <text class="txt" x="16" y="60">Description courte…</text> <text class="txt" x="16" y="150" fill="#4338ca">799.00 DH</text> <rect class="btn2" x="170" y="132" width="60" height="28" rx="6"/> <text class="txt" x="178" y="151">Détail</text> <rect class="btn" x="236" y="132" width="60" height="28" rx="6"/> <text class="txt" x="242" y="151" fill="#fff">Ajouter</text> </g> <g transform="translate(640,0)"> <rect class="card" width="280" height="180" rx="8"/> <text class="ttl" x="16" y="32">Produit C</text> <text class="txt" x="16" y="60">Description courte…</text> <text class="txt" x="16" y="150" fill="#4338ca">249.00 DH</text> <rect class="btn2" x="170" y="132" width="60" height="28" rx="6"/> <text class="txt" x="178" y="151">Détail</text> <rect class="btn" x="236" y="132" width="60" height="28" rx="6"/> <text class="txt" x="242" y="151" fill="#fff">Ajouter</text> </g> </g> </svg>
